#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
    int test;
    scanf("%d", &test);
    while(test--) {
        long long n, k;
        scanf("%lld %lld", &n, &k);
        long long diff=n-k;
        long long ans=(diff)*(k*(k-1))/2;
        if(diff>=2) {
            ans+=(k*diff*(diff-1))/2;
        }
        if(diff>=3) {
            ans+=(diff*(diff-1)*(diff-2))/6;
        }
        printf("%lld\n", ans);
    }
}
